remarks: Value of the morphism part of the functor composition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cofuval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
cofuval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Func E ) ) $.
cofu2nd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
cofu2nd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
cofu2nd $p |- ( ph -> ( X ( 2nd ` ( G o.func F ) ) Y ) = ( ( ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ( 2nd ` G ) ( ( 1st ` F ) ` Y ) ) o. ( X ( 2nd ` F ) Y ) ) ) $.
